Participants low limb loss evaluate follow assessment tool : Demographic data ; age , gender , height , body mass , year , side level limb loss record . Gait parameter ( step length , variation step length ) evaluate Gait Trainer Biodex 2 , participant 's preferred speed.Phantom sensation phantom pain ask existence . DOC.detailed_description: Twenty participant low limb loss refer receive amputee rehabilitation Hacettepe University , Faculty Health Sciences , department Physiotherapy Rehabilitation , Prosthetics Biomechanics unit , subject study . Participants low limb loss evaluate follow assessment tool : Demographic data ; age , gender , height , body mass , year , side level limb loss record . Gait parameter ( step length , variation step length ) evaluate Gait Trainer Biodex 2 , participant 's preferred speed . To eliminate learning effect , participant practice treadmill determine appropriate gait speed . Once participant imply preferred speed , ask walk self select speed 6 minute . Data record 2nd 4th minute walk . Phantom sensation phantom pain ask existence . Sensorial loss evaluate Semmes Weinstein Monofilaments .
DOC.criteria: Individuals unilateral low limb loss Traumatic limb loss Age 2055 year Using conventional type socket design Dynamic foot use Have passive joint limitation extremities Surgery last 1 year Systemic problem neurologic disorder , rheumatoid disordersâ€¦ Another orthopedic anomaly
